subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Although they nearly crashed several times, the Mets finally found fresh pavement in the 10th inning, when Endy Chávez hit a two-out double for the go-ahead run in their victory.
snippet: Although they nearly crashed several times, the Mets finally found fresh pavement in the 10th inning, when Endy Chávez hit a two-out double for the go-ahead run in their victory.
